```{r}
library("MASS")
data = read.table("data.txt")
data = as.matrix(data)
```

# Least Square Approx
```{r}
x = as.matrix(data[,1])
y = as.matrix(data[,2])
phi = matrix(c(x^0,x^1), nrow=dim(data)[1], ncol=dim(data)[2])
w = ginv(phi)%*%y
plot(x,y)
y_new = phi%*%w
lines(x,y_new,col="green")
```
